aboutPage.title: About Me
aboutPage.description: I am a Full Stack Developer with a passion for creating web applications that are both functional and beautiful. I have experience in both front-end and back-end development, and I am always looking to learn new technologies and improve my skills.

contactPage.title: Contact Me
contactPage.description: If you have any questions or would like to work together, please feel free to contact me.

projectsPage.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on as a front-end developer
